ThingDef.label: human leather honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Human Skin bees. Their honeycombs are capped with human skin as the human skin has surprisingly good properties, no wonder its used in so many hats.

ThingDef.label: intellectual honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Intellectual bees. These bees used their big brains to make the smartest idea ever conceived on the rim, instead of making many hexagons for their honey they can just make one big hexagon.

ThingDef.label: empty honeycomb
ThingDef.description: An empty comb not containing anything. Made by beegirls whos instinct tells them to make comb but they can't make the honey to fill it.

ThingDef.label: powdered honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by powdered bees. Over time small specks of beepowder fall of the bees onto the comb making it quite explosive.
